name: Polymarket
description: Polymarket CLOB trading tool (market lookup + orderbook + order placement with approvals).

tradeEnabled.label: Enable Trading
tradeEnabled.help: If false, the tool will only allow read-only actions.

maxNotionalUsd.label: Max Order Notional (USD)
maxNotionalUsd.help: Safety limit. Approx notional is price * size. Increase only if you understand the risk.

allowedMarketSlugs.label: Allowed Market Slugs
allowedMarketSlugs.help: Optional safety allowlist. If set, orders are only allowed when the market slug matches one of these entries.

signatureType.label: Signature Type
signatureType.help: 0=EOA wallet, 1=POLY_PROXY (Polymarket account proxy), 2=GNOSIS_SAFE (proxy). See Polymarket docs.

funderAddress.label: Funder Address
funderAddress.help: EOA address (signatureType=0) or proxy wallet address (signatureType=1/2). If omitted for EOA, defaults to the signer address.

privateKeyEnvVar.label: Private Key Env Var
privateKeyEnvVar.help: Env var name containing your EVM private key. Default POLYMARKET_PRIVATE_KEY. Never paste secrets into chat/tool params.
